It is not possible to add new contacts in the Lite version.

PRIVACY POLICY
This Privacy Policy establishes the terms under which KN-Contacts Lite uses and protects the information that is provided by users when using this application. KN-Apps, who developed KN-Contacts application, is committed to the security of its users\' data. Any data that is accessed from your Contacts Diary or the storage of your device, will be made ensuring that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. Please consider that this Privacy Policy may change over time or be updated, so it is recommended to periodically review this section to ensure that you agree to such changes.
Information that is collected and/or stored
KN-Contacts Lite may collect and/or store the following data of your device, performing the following actions:
* Retrieve contact information from the Contacts Diary: Last Name, First Names, Telephones, Mails, Postal Addresses and Contact Photo, * Get images from storage, * Capture images by using the camera, * Generate and/or obtain files of type CSV and JPG.
Use of information collected and/or stored
To upload contact information, KN-Contacts Lite can obtain certain information from the Contacts Diary of your device, which will be stored in your reserved space and in this way allow access, use and manipulation to the user about this information. The obtaining of this data will be preceded by its corresponding request for access permission, in this way the user will decide whether or not to access the data of contacts. KN-Contacts Lite allows the user to generate and recover backup copies of the information loaded, associate images or captures to the loaded contacts, and generate Excels files of the information loaded as a list. For this, KN-Contacts Lite must access the storage of your device. As with contacts, access to storage will be preceded by their corresponding access permission request. To save the backup copy and / or images, the application generates a "KN-ContactsLite" folder in its storage, inside that folder the backup copy that the user could generate is found, as well as the images that the user associates to each contact (in the "Pictures" subfolder). Likewise, in the case that the user wishes, the application will store a password and a backup email in the category protection section. This data will be used to allow or restrict access to certain information within the application by the user. The user can recover the registered password in case she/he does not remember it by generating a mail (with a previously registered mail) in which the password will be sent. KN-Contacts Lite is highly committed to fulfilling the commitment to keep your information secure.
Use of other Applications
KN-Contacts Lite works in conjunction with other applications installed on your device, particularly for sending emails, making phone calls, sending SMS or WhatsApp, geographic location, file storage, image capture and recovery of images stored on your device. Once the user accesses any of these applications and leaves KN-Contacts Lite, there is no longer control over these applications to which the user is redirected, and therefore KN-Contacts Lite is not responsible for the terms or privacy or protecting your data in those other third-party applications. These applications are subject to their own privacy policies, so it is recommended that you check them to confirm that you agree with them.
KN-Apps will not sell, transfer or distribute the information that is collected.
KN-Apps reserves the right to change the terms of this Privacy Policy at any time.
We invite you to read our Privacy Policy
